naslov: Kuća, PRVI RED DO MORA (3 stana) – SEGET VRANJICA / video / čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju je atraktivna kuća na TOP lokaciji, prvi red uz more, s direktnim izlazom na plažu – rijetkost na tržištu! Smještena u Seget Vranjici, šarmantnom ribarskom mjestu s mediteranskim duhom, udaljenom svega nekoliko minuta vožnje od Trogira, UNESCO grada. Kuća je okružena zelenilom i nudi potpunu privatnost, savršenu za obiteljski život, luksuzni odmor ili turističko ulaganje. RASPORED: Kuća se prostire na tri etaže – prizemlje, prvi kat i penthouse (visoko potkrovlje). • Prizemlje: dvosoban stan s izlazom na prostranu terasu opremljenu jacuzzijem i dijelom natkrivenim prostorom za uživanje. • Prvi kat: elegantno uređen stan s panoramskim pogledom na more. • Penthouse: moderno potkrovlje s velikim staklenim površinama i zadivljujućim pogledom. Napomena: prizemlje i prvi kat povezani su unutarnjim stubištem koje je trenutno zatvoreno, no po želji kupca može se ponovno spojiti u jednu cjelinu. POGLED: S svih etaža pruža se panoramski pogled na more – zalasci sunca i zvuk valova su doslovno dio svakodnevice. IZGRADNJA I OPREMA: • Godina gradnje: 2012. • Zadnja adaptacija: prije nekoliko godina • Sve sobe su klimatizirane • Kuća je kompletno novo namještena i opremljena – spremna za useljenje bez dodatnih ulaganja. PARKING: Kući pripada više parkirnih mjesta, što je velika prednost za obitelj ili goste. IDEALNA INVESTICIJA: Bilo da tražite dom za obitelj, luksuznu vikendicu ili nekretninu s iznimnim turističkim potencijalom – ova kuća nudi sve. Iznimna pozicija u prvom redu do mora čini je jedinstvenom prilikom na tržištu. Za više informacija, detaljni video, slike, lokaciju ili dogovor oko razgledavanja – slobodno nas kontaktirajte. - prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% + pdv od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. ENG ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- For sale is an attractive house in a TOP location, first row to the sea, with direct access to the beach - a rarity on the market! Located in Seget Vranjica, a charming fishing village with a Mediterranean spirit, just a few minutes drive from Trogir, a UNESCO city. The house is surrounded by greenery and offers complete privacy, perfect for family life, a luxurious vacation or a tourist investment. LAYOUT: The house is spread over three floors - ground floor, first floor and penthouse (high attic). • Ground floor: two-bedroom apartment with access to a spacious terrace equipped with a jacuzzi and a partially covered area for enjoyment. • First floor: elegantly decorated apartment with panoramic sea views. • Penthouse: modern attic with large glass surfaces and stunning views. Note: the ground floor and first floor are connected by an internal staircase that is currently closed, but can be reconnected into one unit at the buyer's request. VIEW: All floors offer panoramic sea views – sunsets and the sound of the waves are literally a part of everyday life. CONSTRUCTION AND EQUIPMENT: • Year of construction: 2012 • Last renovation: a few years ago • All rooms are air-conditioned • The house is completely newly furnished and equipped – ready to move in without any additional investment. PARKING: The house has several parking spaces, which is a great advantage for family or guests. IDEAL INVESTMENT: Whether you are looking for a family home, a luxury weekend home or a property with exceptional tourist potential – this house offers it all. The exceptional position in the first row to the sea makes it a unique opportunity on the market. For more information, detailed video, pictures, location or to arrange a viewing – please feel free to contact us. - sale of #adriaINgroup agency - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + VAT from the sales price Dear clients, viewing of the property is only possible with a signed mediation agreement, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on mediation in real estate transactions. #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
